1.「お前さんのおかげで 準備も ととのった。| いよいよ 伐採同盟と対決！: Thanks to you, we're all set. Now it's time to|face the logging alliance!

2.「……と言いたいところだが| じつは 困ったことが 起こってのう。: I'd like to say that I'm in trouble.

3.「見張りに出ていった ユウギリが| いつまでたっても 戻らんので| レーノスに: Yugiri went out on guard duty, but he never|came back, so I sent Renosu to check on him.

4.「そしたら ケガを負った様子のユウギリが| 伐採同盟のアジトに 連れ込まれるとこ: Then he saw Yugiri, who appeared to be|injured, being taken into the logging|alliance's hideout.

5.「もうすぐ 本部の援軍も 来るというのに| ユウギリを 人質に取られていては|: Reinforcements from headquarters will be|arriving soon, but with Yugiri as a hostage,|we can't do anything... what can we do?

6.「支部長！| 同盟の連中 動きだしましたぜ！: Branch Manager! The Alliance is on the move!

7.「今度は えらく 気合いの入った様子の出発だ。| 連中 本格的に伐採を 始めるつ: This time, they are very enthusiastic about|the departure. They're going to start logging|in earnest!

9.「よし こうしよう！| わしは ここに残り 本部からの援軍が| 来るのを 待って: All right, here's the plan! I will stay here|and wait for reinforcements to arrive from|headquarters.

10.「そして 彼らが到着したら| 伐採同盟の連中が 向かった先に| 行ってもらうこと: And when they arrive, we'll ask them to go|where the logging allies are headed!

11.「レーノスと <pc>。| お前さんたちは ヤツらのアジトに潜入し| 囚われのユ: Renosu and <pc>. You must infiltrate|their hideout and rescue Yugiri from|captivity!

12.「今なら アジトに使われている| 森外れのほら穴の守りも うすいはず。| どうじ: The Cave Outside Forest used as a hideout|should be less protected now. What do you|think? Will you accept this mission?

13.「では 頼んだぞ レーノス。<pc>。| 今回ばかりは わしも ダジャレ無しの|: Well, then, you're in good hands, Renosu.|<pc>. For once, I'm in serious mode,|no pun intended!

14.「よし！ 伐採同盟のアジトは| モリナラ大森林の奥にある 森外れのほら穴だ。|: All right! The logging alliance's hideout is a|Cave Outside Forest, deep in the Molinara|Forest. I'll go ahead! You follow me!

15.「では 頼んだぞ……と思ったら| なんじゃ その 頼まれごとの数は！？: Now, I'm going to ask you for a favor... but|what's with all the favors you're getting?

16.「それでは 仕事のひとつも 頼めんぞ！| ええい。さっさと 手を空けてくるのじゃ: I can't ask you to do a single job for me|then! No. Go get your hands off of it!

17.「チッ！ これだから シロートはよ。| もういい。オレは ひとりでも行く！| お: Tsk! That's why Shirouto's here. That's|enough. I'll go alone! You do what you want!

18.「いい作戦だと 思うんじゃがのう。| いったい 何が気に入らないと言うんじゃ？: I think it's a good strategy. What the hell is|wrong with you?

19.「チッ！ こんなときに ビビリかよ。| もういい。オレは ひとりでも行く！| お: Tsk! You're a coward at a time like this.|That's enough. I'll go alone! You do what you|want!

20.「あんた方 こんなところまで| なんの用で 来なすったのかね？: What brings you all this way?

21.「なんの用か……だと！？| お前たちに 囚われた仲間を| 助けにきたに 決まって: What do you want...? Of course I'm here to|rescue my companions who are being held|captive by you!

23.「トボけてんじゃねえ！| ここが 伐採同盟のアジトで| オメーらが その一員なの: Don't play dumb with me! We know this is a|logging alliance and you're a part of it!

26.「……いかにも わしらは 伐採同盟を| 名乗っております。しかし その実体は|: We call ourselves a logging alliance. But in|reality, we are a group of refugees with old|men and children.

27.「わしらは もともと このエルトナ大陸に| 移民してきた 木こりの集団でしてな。: We are a group of lumberjacks who originally|immigrated to Eltona Continent. We made our|living by cultivating a certain forest.

28.「ところが その森が 魔瘴に侵されましてな。| 生活の糧を失った わしらは モリ:
However, the forest was invaded by demon|miasma. Losing our livelihood, we had no|choice but to settle down in the Molinara|
|Forest.

29.「……あんたらの事情は わかったけどな。| うちの仲間を さらっておいて| 一方: I understand your situation. But it's not nice|to play the victim when you kidnapped one of|our companions.

31.「その人たちは 私を さらったりなんて| してませんよぅ。| ただ 助けてくれた: They didn't kidnap me. They just helped me!

32.「無事だったのか ユウギリ。| ……いったい どういうことだよ？: Are you all right, Yugiri? What the hell is|going on?

33.「私 このアジトを見張る任務の途中で| 魔物に襲われて ケガしちゃったんです。|: I was on a mission to guard this hideout when|I was attacked by a monster and injured. So|the people here took care of me...

34.「どうやら そのときの様子を見られて| 誤解なさったようですな。| ……まあ 無: It seems that you misunderstood me because of|the way I looked at you at that time. Well,|that's understandable.

35.「伐採同盟の人たち 悪い人じゃないんです。| おたがい 相手の事情を 知らなかっ:
The people in the logging alliance are not bad|people. We just didn't know each other's|situation, but if we talk it out, I'm sure we|
|can work something out!

36.「悪いが そりゃもう 遅いってもんだぜ。| 今ごろ 本部からの援軍と 同盟の連中: I'm sorry, but it's a little late for that. By|now, the reinforcements from headquarters and|the allies must have started a big battle.

37.「そ そんなぁ……。| いや！ こうしちゃいられません！| そんなの 絶対止めな: Oh, no, no, no, no, no! I can't do this! You|have to stop that! You have to stop that!

38.「オレたちでか？| んなの無理に決まってんだろ！| もし 止められるヤツが いる: By ourselves? Of course we can't! If there's|anyone who can stop it...

39.「そこの 選ばれし レンジャーだけだろうぜ。: I'm sure it's just a select few rangers there.

40.「……そうね。| <pc>なら もしかして……。: I guess... I think <pc> might be able|to...

41.「とにかく 同盟の人たちを追いましょ！| たぶん 前に 彼らが伐採を行っていた|: Anyway, let's go after the allies! Maybe|they're going to Molinara Square, where they|used to do their logging!

42.「これでも 期待してるんだからよ……| 裏切らないでくれよな。: I'm still counting on you... don't betray me.

43.「……やれやれ 頼られる立場ってのは| つらいもんだな 相棒。: It's hard to be in a position where you have|to depend on someone, isn't it, buddy?

44.「それにしても 今日の森は| どーも ザワザワしてんだよな……。| なんだか 落: But the forest today is so noisy... I feel so|restless and I don't want to be.

45.「みんな やめてーっ！！| 話し合えば きっと わかりあえるよっ！: Guys, stop it! If we talk, we'll understand|each other!

46.「……いや 様子が おかしいぜ。: No, there's something wrong with you.

47.「ピッピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピ。| ギュオン！ ギュオォォォォォォン: Beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep. Gyuuong! G|yuoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo|ooooooooooooooo!

48.「な なんだ コイツ！？| 突然 おかしな動きを……。: What the hell is this? Suddenly, it's moving|in a strange way...

49.「くそっ！ 言うこと 聞きゃあしねえ。| ブッ壊れちまった……。: Damn it! He won't listen to me. I'm broken...

51.「ピッピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピ。| ギュオン！ ギュオォォォォォォン: Beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep. Gyuuong! G|yuoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo|ooooooooooooooo!

54.伐採マシン改は 森に つっこみ|大爆発した！: The Choppin Machine v2 crashed into the forest|and blew up!

55.「あわわわわ……。| モリナラ大森林が 燃えちゃうっ！: Awww... the Molinara Forest is on fire!

56.「オメーらっ 争うのは 後だ！| 今は 協力して 森を炎から 守るぞ！: Hey, you guys, we'll fight later! For now, we|must work together to save the forest from the|flames!

57.「ヤベえぜ こりゃ。| 何かが…………くるっっ！！: Oh, man, this is bad. Something's... coming!

58.<center>……ヒトよ。|ここは お前たちの領域に非ず。: This is not your domain, human. This is not|your domain.

59.そのとき モリナラ大森林の中を|一陣の風が 吹きぬけた。: At that moment, a gust of wind blew through|the Molinara Forest.

60.その突風は 燃えさかる炎を 消しとめ|辺り一帯に 深い静寂を もたらした。: The gust of wind extinguished the flames and|brought a deep silence to the area.

62.「このモリナラ大森林に宿る 精霊たちの| はげしい 怒りと 憎しみが| 今の風を: The fierce anger and hatred of the spirits|that dwell here in the Molinara Forest is what|makes the winds blow the way they do now...

63.「戦っちゃいけねえぞ 相棒！| こいつらは レーノスや ユウギリ嬢ちゃんの| 変: Don't fight them, buddy! They're the altered|forms of Renosu and Miss Yugiri...

64.「森の怒りにふれた者は すべて| 森の魔物に 姿を変えられちまうんだ！: Anyone who touches the forest's wrath is|transformed into a forest monster!

65.「……そうだ 支部長に報告しようぜ！| あの おっさんなら なんとかする方法を|: I say we report this to the branch manager.|Maybe that old man will know how to do|something about it.

66.「わしらのことは 気になさらず| 早く 行って 争いを止めてくだされ！: Don't worry about us, just go and stop the|fighting!

67.「た 大変だ 支部長のおっさん！| 森の精霊たちが 怒りだして| みんな じんめ: Oh, my God, the old branch chief! The spirits|of the forest got angry and turned everyone|into human heads!

68.「……やはり 先ほど感じた| 異様な 森のざわめきは| そういうことであったか。: I guess that was the reason for the strange|rustling in the forest I had felt earlier.

69.「モリナラの自然を守って ３０年。| この日の来ないことを 祈っておったが| そ: Thirty years of protecting the nature of|Molinara. I prayed this day would never come,|but it has, until Renosu and Yugiri...

70.「知ってたのかよ おっさん！？| もしかして どうしたら あいつらを| 元に戻せ: You knew, old man? Do you have any idea what|it would take to get them back?

71.「方法が ないわけではない……はずじゃ。| だが それは 危険をともなう。| 簡: There is a way...there must be a way. But it|is dangerous. It is not something that can be|easily taught.

72.「おっさんの部下だって 巻き込まれてんのに| そんなこと言ってる場合かよ！| …: Even the old man's men are involved, but this|is no time to talk like that! Then what are we|going to do?

73.「そうじゃな。<pc>が | 充分にチカラをつけ 時が満ちたら| カミハルムイ: That's right. When <pc> is strong|enough and the time is right, you will go to|Kamiharmui's headquarters.

74.「そのとき お前さんに 資格ありと| 本部が認めれば 精霊たちの怒りを| 鎮める: At that time, if Headquarters deems you|qualified, you will be taught how to appease|the spirits' wrath.

75.「とにかく 今は どうにもならん。| とりあえず これを受け取りなさい。: Anyway, I can't help you now. In the meantime,|take this.

76.「<pc>が 森の怒りから逃れられたのは| その身体に スピルどのを宿す| 選ば: The only reason <pc> was able to|escape the wrath of the forest was because he|was the chosen ranger with Spiel in his body.

77.「その お前さんならば きっと| 今の状況も どうにか できる……。| わしは: I am sure that you will be able to handle the|current situation... I have faith in that.

78.「ここにいても あいつらを| 助けることはできそうにねえ……。| くやしいけど: I don't think we're going to be able to help|these guys if we stay here... it sucks, but|let's get back to it now, buddy.
